message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. That's the price I'm willing to pay for it.
I understand that $180 is a bit steep, but I've already invested a lot in the product and I'd like to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product, can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go as low as $140, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $155, which is a bit higher than your last offer, but still a good deal for you.
I'm still a bit short on budget, but I really like the product. I'm willing to pay $145 for it, can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go as low as $145, but I'm willing to meet you at $152.50. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept for the product.
